backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with storage mixins, authorization, and comprehensive types for users, posts, comments, stories, notifications, conversations, and support issues.
backend/migration.mo: Provides type definitions and structures for migrating state between old and new actor versions, including posts, profiles, notifications, and stories.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend components, hooks, and config files used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that loads the React app entry point into a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React Query client and TanStack Router with authenticated and role‑restricted routes for core app pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/FeatureFla: Admin panel to view and toggle feature flags such as filters and music using backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/PostModera: Displays all posts for admin review and allows deleting posts with author info and images.
frontend/src/components/admin/SupportIss: Placeholder panel stating support issue management is unavailable due to missing backend methods.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserModera: Admin tool to search users and modify their verification status with role-based restrictions.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header, outlet content, mobile tab bar, and footer displaying version info.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen allowing users to sign in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper component enforcing authentication, handling profile loading, errors, and setup flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Protects routes by checking user role (admin or officer) and shows appropriate error or redirect options.
Renders a horizontal stories row with story creation, loading skeletons, and story viewer integration.
frontend/src/components/nav/HeaderNav.ts: Top navigation bar showing links, notifications, and profile or settings access based on user data and role.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTabBar: Mobile bottom tab bar with navigation icons, conditional moderation tab, and profile/settings routing.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a single post with author info, image, likes, comments, share actions, and optional delete.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostGrid.t: Renders a grid of post thumbnails that navigate to the post detail page when clicked.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Modal dialog for editing profile fields, validating input, and submitting updates with success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowBu: Follow/unfollow button handling requests, pending states, and approval-required flows.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowRe: Panel listing incoming follow requests with approve/deny actions and requester info.
frontend/src/components/profile/Highligh: Static highlights row UI with placeholder items and an option to add a new highlight.
frontend/src/components/profile/MediaCon: UI panel allowing admins to toggle global filters and music feature flags with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Renders a user avatar with size options and a fallback default image.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog form for creating a new user profile with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/SuperAdm: Super-admin panel to grant or remove verification badges, with admin restrictions and status alerts.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verified: SVG verified badge component with selectable color variants.
frontend/src/components/stories/CreateSt: Dialog for uploading and previewing an image story with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/stories/StoryVie: Story viewer modal showing the story image, author info, and like/unlike controls.
frontend/src/constants/superAdmin.ts: Defines the super-admin principal and a helper to check if a principal matches it.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when changed.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminModeration.ts: Mutation hook for setting a user's verified status and refreshing profile data.
Provides a hook for showing formatted backend errors or success messages via toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Determines the user’s effective role using identity, admin checks, and profile data with caching and fallback logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useFeatureFlags.ts: Stub hooks for feature flags that return defaults and throw on update due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/useFollowRequests.ts: Stub hooks for follow-request operations that return empty data and throw on mutations until backend is implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, persistence, and context access via an authentication provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Implements conversation and messaging queries and mutations, including fetching conversations, messages, and sending messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Stub hooks for notifications that return empty data and throw on mutation due to missing backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Provides hooks for fetching, creating, and deleting posts using the backend actor with error formatting and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfiles.ts: Implements profile queries and mutations for fetching and updating user profiles with error handling and cache refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialGraph.ts: Stub social-graph hooks for followers and following that return empty data and throw on follow/unfollow actions until backend exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: React-query hooks for fetching, creating, and liking stories via the backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupport.ts: Placeholder hooks for support issue operations; all backend methods are missing so they return empty data or errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/style setup defining CSS variables for light and dark themes and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPortalPage.tsx: Admin page providing tabs for user moderation, post moderation, feature flags, and support issues.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Messaging UI that initializes conversations, displays messages, and allows sending new messages with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Form page for creating posts with caption and optional image upload, including validation and preview.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Explore page enabling username search and displaying recent posts and user info.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeedPage.tsx: Home feed showing stories, posts, loading states, errors, and empty feed UI.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Displays a list of conversations, handling loading, empty state, and navigation to individual message threads.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows notifications and pending follow requests with read-status handling and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Renders a single post with likes, comments, sharing, and author info, including loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile, posts, and follow state with support for editing, messaging, and permission logic.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides account settings including logout, support navigation, and app version info.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Shows a support form UI, but submission is disabled due to missing backend functionality.
frontend/src/types/missing-backend-types: Defines TypeScript types for unimplemented backend features such as posts, comments, notifications, and support issues.
frontend/src/utils/formatBackendError.ts: Maps backend and IC agent error messages to short user-friendly strings, with fallbacks for unknown formats.
frontend/src/utils/postImage.ts: Provides helpers to convert image byte data to blob URLs, revoke them, and convert File objects into Uint8Array for uploads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: JSON file tracking project state, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues for the Instabook app.
